74c8debdc2e7663514aecd757b0260e3d7","dweb:/ipfs/QmcjxMki9gPoVB5gQpPq4FtR8t1ZVCKFA5B8xLMSj9cAQz"]},"src/modules/MINTR/MINTR.v1.sol":{"keccak256":"0xda5a6ce7f15c4ee5781a45f6870ed88473b8ac71c95357b5f38c7620f90b7145","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://54ab67e09e0461f2f7d7bb68b942175d50745f704a06f0e78e2805e34c8948d6","dweb:/ipfs/QmP8yxjxrh1ngSb6tQ7BrmMLvfzwBCxrrdDYqeGbXsN3Nz"]},"src/modules/ROLES/GoerliDaoRoles.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc4799ee14eee67b84955c6c2caef59b78337a216883ca7e09ffe118efd5b4e58","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://8c74fe43e5b0d207bf85108363abda27fd66be4e830aa284258aeb48926abe4d","dweb:/ipfs/QmdmXGdtMCFB5w18xnwZJTixESGLyJY2qvMafZGGMFTWfH"]},"src/modules/ROLES/ROLES.v1.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9adeb15569648e1dc977b5ae44d48ce79a63790625510a616b37df9d9e093985","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://d16866adf6987025ea2f89c1e20613a5df351eaeb46d6b0fc5caf88d41734300","dweb:/ipfs/QmZbRoJcUhe4eUzYriPpGFx5NEbmh7Q2DZzrgYLanvqYKd"]},"src/modules/TRSRY/TRSRY.v1.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd9a4593375bded6d7adf5034e0b07b8a315a144dcfe182370d8832cb03908ef1","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://867d7f9633a34bf7204755de2b7004e495a5fb7bc2b04e7223adb0e6c1e012d2","dweb:/ipfs/QmZkhGbDbMfygWiGSrCXNNPca3oZreQY8ZWBBN6uvYUkDC"]},"src/policies/Distributor.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0f52ea6f1c09495e0116c64bc20751fba0ec899098981fb6c98cbeaca3c59d7c","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://f16e870a7bee5689e6a78ea8b774c78e4b9ae99dd0b164bd79f84502524ffc55","dweb:/ipfs/QmcL4NG5zBoR32UnHsrfANe11U5unMmHYFPWqyqSbHnkJX"]}},"version":1}

params.index_: The index in the pools array to add the liquidity pool to.
params.pool_: The address of the liquidity pool to add.

params.who_: The address to get the next reward for.

returns._0: uint256 The next reward for the given address.

removePool(uint256,address).details: This function is only available to an authorized user.

params.index_: The index in the pools array of the liquidity pool to remove.
params.pool_: The address of the liquidity pool to remove.

returns.permissions: - Array of keycodes and function selectors for requested permissions.

returns._0: uint256 The amount of GDAO minted as a bounty.

setBounty(uint256).details: This function is only available to an authorized user.

params.bounty_: The new bounty amount in GDAO (9 decimals).

setPools(address[]).details: This function is only available to an authorized user.

params.pools_: The array of Uniswap V2 pools.

params.newRewardRate_: The new rate to set (9 decimals, i.e. 10_000_000 / 1_000_000_000 = 1%)

addPool(uint256,address).notice: Adds a liquidity pool to the list of pools to be minted into

changeKernel(address).notice: Function used by kernel when migrating to a new kernel.

configureDependencies().notice: Define module dependencies for this policy.

distribute().notice: Send the epoch's reward to the staking contract, and mint rewards to Uniswap V2 pools.         This removes opportunity cost for liquidity providers by sending rebase rewards         directly into the liquidity pool.         NOTE: This does not add additional emissions (user could be staked instead and get the         same tokens).

isActive().notice: Easily accessible indicator for if a policy is activated or not.

nextRewardFor(address).notice: Returns the next reward for the given address based on their GDAO balance.

removePool(uint256,address).notice: Removes a liquidity pool from the list of pools to be minted into

requestPermissions().notice: Function called by kernel to set module function permissions.

retrieveBounty().notice: Mints the bounty (if > 0) to the staking contract for distribution.

setPools(address[]).notice: Sets the Uniswap V2 pools to be minted into

setRewardRate(uint256).notice: Sets the new GDAO reward rate to mint and distribute per epoch

triggerRebase().notice: Trigger rebases via distributor. There is an error in Staking's `stake` function         which pulls forward part of the rebase for the next epoch. This path triggers a         rebase by calling `unstake` (which does not have the issue). The patch also         restricts `distribute` to only be able to be called from a tx originating in this         function.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Permissions memory[] memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Trigger rebases via distributor. There is an error in Staking's `stake` function
         which pulls forward part of the rebase for the next epoch. This path triggers a
         rebase by calling `unstake` (which does not have the issue). The patch also
         restricts `distribute` to only be able to be called from a tx originating in this
         function.

@notice Send the epoch's reward to the staking contract, and mint rewards to Uniswap V2 pools.
         This removes opportunity cost for liquidity providers by sending rebase rewards
         directly into the liquidity pool.
         NOTE: This does not add additional emissions (user could be staked instead and get the
         same tokens).

@notice Mints the bounty (if > 0) to the staking contract for distribution.
 @return uint256 The amount of GDAO minted as a bounty.

@notice Sets the new GDAO reward rate to mint and distribute per epoch
 @param newRewardRate_ The new rate to set (9 decimals, i.e. 10_000_000 / 1_000_000_000 = 1%)
